messages.subject: Whole child whole parent
messages.msgSnippet: About Whole Child, Whole Parent Sandra said: It probably is.  I m sorry.  So never mind that one. I bet this is never going to happen again...but I finally
messages.messageBody:
About "Whole Child, Whole Parent" Sandra said:
"It probably is. I'm sorry. So never mind that one."

I bet this is never going to happen again...but I finally get to say this:
DON'T LISTEN TO SANDRA!! Ok there. That was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, just couldn't resist.:)

I bought my copy of "Whole Child, Whole Parent" from half.com, but they're gone now. I imagine Amazon or Ebay would have one fairly inexpensive. It's an awesome book. Get it!

Ren


"There is no way to
peace. Peace is the way."
~Quaker saying
